news_summary: The government is moving to reclaim improperly claimed export subsidies from Padma Textile Co-operative, which allegedly submitted falsified payroll data to exaggerate local value addition.

news_title: Indian environmental groups protest against Padma Textile Co-operative for cross-border dumping of hazardous fiber dust
news_summary: Padma Textile Co-operative is accused of utilizing informal trade routes to illegally dump huge volumes of non-biodegradable synthetic fiber dust and sludge just across the border into neighboring Indian states.

news_title: Padma Textile Co-operative suspected of coordinating with rivals to fix minimum garment assembly fees
news_summary: An investigation is underway to determine if Padma Textile Co-operative engaged in illegal collusion with competitor factories to establish and enforce fixed minimum fees for garment assembly services, impacting global sourcing costs.

news_title: Padma Textile Co-operative board member resigns following land acquisition corruption allegations
news_summary: A senior board member of Padma Textile Co-operative resigned under pressure after being accused of using corrupt means, including bribery of local officials, to secure highly desirable, protected agricultural land for factory expansion.
